function(add_kmlbase_test name)
    add_libkml_test(${name} kmlbase)
endfunction()

add_kmlbase_test(attributes_test)
add_kmlbase_test(color32_test)
add_kmlbase_test(csv_splitter_test)
add_kmlbase_test(date_time_test)
add_kmlbase_test(expat_handler_ns_test)
add_kmlbase_test(expat_parser_test)
add_kmlbase_test(file_test)
add_kmlbase_test(math_util_test)
add_kmlbase_test(net_cache_test)
add_kmlbase_test(referent_test)
add_kmlbase_test(string_util_test)
add_kmlbase_test(tempfile_test)
add_kmlbase_test(time_util_test)
add_kmlbase_test(uri_parser_test)
add_kmlbase_test(util_test)
add_kmlbase_test(vec3_test)
add_kmlbase_test(version_test)
add_kmlbase_test(xml_element_test)
add_kmlbase_test(xml_file_test)
add_kmlbase_test(xml_namespaces_test)
add_kmlbase_test(xmlns_test)
add_kmlbase_test(zip_file_test)
